title: Xtraverse, I cannot Log in to Spatang
content:
hey xtraverse, i tried emailing you awhile back but you never replied..

I am having trouble accessing my part of spatang.com

[url=http://www.spatang.com/nickssoftware]www.spatang.com/nickssoftware[/url]

all was working good until a couple of days ago this came up every time i tried to log in.

20-You are user number 2 of 50 allowed.
220-Local time is now 19:31. Server port: 21.
220 You will be disconnected after 15 minutes of inactivity.
USER nickssoftware@spatang.com
331 User nickssoftware@spatang.com OK. Password required
PASS (hidden)
530 Authentication failed, sorry
Cannot login waiting to retry (30s)...



I really want to release the full version of Super Keen Fighter 4, but I havent been able to access my part of spatang? any answers xtra?

thanks[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-deadkeenvort.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-redeyes.gif[/img]
